title: How Far Is Too Far? a Discussion on "Cuties" with Cassidy Polling
description:
As if there wasn't enough drama in the world, I figured it would be an excellent idea to add to it with a discussion on the controversial film "Cuties." My very capable interlocutor is filmmaker Cassidy Polling, who lends who perspective and expertise to this discussion.

Listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/How-Far-Is-Too-Far--a-Discussion-on-Cuties-with-Cassidy-Polling-ekn2en

Follow me on twitter @AndreaLynnLewis
Email me at andrealynnlewis@gmail.com
